bibl.title: Stamp-seals from Geronisos and their Contexts. Avec résumé en grec.
bibl.note: The small island of Geronisos of Cyprus has yielded the only Ptolemaic ostraka found to date in all of Cyprus, painted and incised with Greek cursive script [1st century B.C., to be published by Roger BAGNALL]. - Catalogue [of the stamp-seals, Nos 1-16]. - Technical aspects. - Usage and function. - Iconography: Ptolemaic [royal] portraits and devices; - Cypriot subject-matter; - Varia.- Excavation and stratigraphic contexts. - Cyprus under the last Ptolemies.
CONNELLY Joan Breton and Dimitris PLANTZOS, Stamp-seals from Geronisos and their Contexts. Avec résumé en grec.
